text: Marianela is a 1940 Spanish drama film directed by Benito Perojo. It is based on the 1878 novel by Benito Pérez Galdós. == Cast == * Mary Carrillo - Nela * Julio Peña - Pablo * Rafael Calvo - Teodoro Golfín * Jesús Tordesillas - Pablo's Father * Carlos Muñoz - Celipín * María Mercader - Florentina == References == == External links == * Category:1940 drama films Category:1940 films Category:Spanish films Category:Films based on works by Benito Pérez Galdós Category:Spanish black-and-white films Category:Spanish drama films
title: Marianela (1940 film)
